Home.promoSub: On all coffee drinks this week!

About.title: About Coffee Take
About.subtitle: Your favorite coffee, delivered fresh
About.ourStoryText: Coffee Take was founded in 2024 with a simple mission: to bring the finest coffee experience to your doorstep. We partner with local coffee shops to ensure you get the freshest, highest quality coffee drinks, delivered right to your door.
About.ourMissionText: We believe everyone deserves access to great coffee. Our platform connects you with the best local coffee shops, making it easy to enjoy your favorite drinks anytime, anywhere.
About.feature1Text: We work only with certified coffee shops that meet our high standards
About.feature2Text: Your order is delivered hot and fresh within 30 minutes
About.feature3Text: Competitive prices and regular promotions for our customers
About.feature4Text: Our customer support team is always ready to help you

Location.title: Our Locations
Location.subtitle: Visit us at our coffee shops
